channel.title: [Release]GamersTips Vision Modeling Software[Release]
channel.description:
Im pretty good at Visual Basic 6, and i have been working on a modeling software, and its finished! So i am releasing to the public.
Its called GamersTips Vision.
Here are some pictures:
[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/7421/61411481.png[/img] [img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/9007/53744224.png[/img] [img]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/8981/25090734.png[/img] [img]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/2112/76347902.png[/img] [img]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/5862/17349330.png[/img]
DOWNLOAD http://uppit.com/v/QK1JV81Q
its not that good, but i like it.
Tell me what you think of it.

item.title: [Release]GamersTips Vision Modeling Software[Release]
item.dc:creator: @Gamerstips Gamerstips
item.description:
@Gamerstips wrote:

I got some tutorials on youtube.

I didnt use visual basic 6 3d, it just used math (alot of it).

Read full topic

item.title: [Release]GamersTips Vision Modeling Software[Release]
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Gamerstips, post:8, topic:275410”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=363826.msg2763415#msg2763415 date=1240675268]

im not sure if gamer used his own.

Is it even possible to make such a thing in vb6? I would assume you would need a much more complex language to make one.
I have your F3D engine and posted in your topic. How could I have not remembered?

Gamerstips, can you add textures to these wireframes?
[/quote]

No, this is my first try at a 3D modeling software.

The next one i make will be MUCH better[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 25, 2009, 10:32:22 am[/size][hr]I did make this in vb6[/quote]
Did you use vb6’s 3d, or did you write your own 3d engine with math and stuff. It doesn’t matter if you didn’t, im just wondering.

Read full topic

item.title: [Release]GamersTips Vision Modeling Software[Release]
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:4, topic:275410”][quote author=Frell link=topic=363826.msg2762866#msg2762866 date=1240634650]
Does this use your own engine?
[/quote]
It exports models as .3DF which iirc is a Quickdraw 3D File.[/quote]
Lol, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,345386.0.html

My engine^^

Mine loads .3df and exports object and 3df. But i wrote my own engine with java, im not sure if gamer used his own.
